SCTX:
Begin botrirScript

short done
short nolore

if ( done == -1 )
	return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex MV_RecoverWidowmaker > 50 )
	return
endif

if ( menumode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( done == 0 )
	if ( GetCurrentAiPackage == 3 )		
		If ( GetDistance "Iveri Llothri" <= 800 )	
			StartCombat "Iveri Llothri"
			set done to 1
		endif
	endif
endif



;if ( GetJournalIndex MV_RecoverWidowmaker >= 10 )
	;if ( GetJournalIndex MV_RecoverWidowmaker <= 50 )
		if ( Player->GetItemCount "widowmaker_unique" > 0 )
			if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
				if ( GetDeadCount "Iveri Llothri" > 0 )
					;Journal "MV_RecoverWidowmaker" 50
					ForceGreeting
				endif
			endif
		endif
	;endif
;endif

	If ( OnDeath == 1 )
			Journal "MV_RecoverWidowmaker", 90
			set done to -1
	endif

End
